Task Name: INSTRUCTIONS: Fill in columns B-D and F for your tasks. Columns E and G-K calculate automatically. Copy formulas from example rows. Hourly Rate = fully loaded cost (salary + benefits + overhead). SEA typical: $15-40/hr. US typical: $50-80/hr.
1. Open this file in Google Sheets or Excel
2. Replace example rows with your actual tasks
3. Column B: How many hours/week does this task take today?
4. Column C: How many hours/week with AI doing the first draft?
5. Column D: How many hours/week reviewing/editing AI output?
7. Column F: Your fully loaded hourly rate (salary + benefits + overhead / 2000 hours)
10. Column I: Annual cost of AI tools (ChatGPT $240/yr, Claude $240/yr, etc.)
11. Column J: =H-I (net savings after tool costs)
- Review/Edit time is critical: AI output always needs human review
- First-month savings will be 30-50% lower (learning curve)
- Not all tasks are good fits for AI. If AI-Assisted + Review > Current, don't automate it
- Adjust hourly rate for your market. SEA rates: SG $40-60, MY $20-35, ID $15-25, TH $20-30
- Tool costs assume 1 user. Multiply by number of team members using AI tools
